answers.text: any behavior of one animal that affects the current or future behavior of another animal

qas.question: What is the study of animal communication called?
What is the study of human communication called?
What are some fields of knowledge concerning the animal world that have been revolutionizes in the 21st century?

answers.text: animal emotions, animal culture and learning

qas.question: What field of communication has been investigated more thoroughly?
Anthroposemiotics is the study of animal what?
Zoo semiotics is the study of human what?
A special field of animal communication that has not been investigated is what?
What is defined as any one behavior of all animals that affects the current or future behavior of another animal?
Human and animal communication is a rapidly growing field of study in what century.

context: The broad field of animal communication encompasses most of the issues in ethology. <b8_0>Animal communication<b8_0/> can be defined as <a0_0>any behavior of one animal that affects the current or future behavior of another animal<a0_0/>. The study of animal <b5_0>communication<b5_0/>, called <a1_0>zoo semiotics<a1_0/> (distinguishable from <a2_0>anthroposemiotics<a2_0/>, the study of human <b6_0>communication<b6_0/>) has played an important part in the development of ethology, sociobiology, and the study of animal cognition. Animal communication, and indeed the understanding of the animal world in general, is a rapidly growing field, and even in the <b9_0>21st<b9_0/> century so far, a great share of prior understanding related to diverse fields such as personal symbolic name use, <a3_0>animal emotions, animal culture and learning<a3_0/>, and even sexual conduct, long thought to be well understood, has been revolutionized. A special field of animal communication has been investigated in more detail such as <a4_0><b7_0>vibrational communication<b7_0/><a4_0/>.
